metaData.title: Something About me
metaData.info:
I am a Computer Science Engineer and Full-Stack Developer based in Maharashtra, India.

My passion lies in developing exceptional digital solutions that enhance people's lives. My expertise includes developing mobile applications, creating web apps, and building robust backend servers.

I enjoy working on cool projects and am fascinated by the entire full-stack spectrum, from the front-end to the back-end. I have a track record of collaborating with like-minded people to deliver successful solutions that exceed client expectations.

metaData.title: Software Engineer @JP Morgan Chase & Co.
metaData.info:
- I work as a Full-stack Software Engineer, where my responsibilities include contributing to the development of applications and new features, writing and testing code, debugging issues, and implementing new features that enhance the usability and user-friendliness of the software.

- Overall, my job is to create high-quality software that meets the needs of the end-users and delivers a great user experience.

metaData.title: Software Developer Intern @Persistent Systems
metaData.info:
- As a Software Developer Intern, I gained hands-on experience working with Spring Boot, React and Database technologies.

- I worked closely with experienced developers, learned best practices for software development.

- By the end of my internship, I had gained a solid foundation in software development and was able to contribute to projects effectively. This experience helped me jumpstart my career as a software developer and prepared me for future opportunities.

metaData.detail1: Proficient in both Functional and Object-Oriented Programming
metaData.detail3: Passionate about UI/UX. Experienced in HTML, CSS, JS, React framework.
metaData.detail4: Can Google better than most of the people.

tech.Frontend: Java (Spring Boot), Javascript (NodeJS, ReactJS), SQL & NoSQL Databases
tech.Backend: DevOps, Full-Stack, Android Development, Web Development

metaData.info:
- Recognized as the first runner-up in the 2022 IEOM Society - 2nd India International Conference Paper Competition for excellence in research and innovation.

- As a team lead, secured a prize at the EG-100 Educational Game Development Hackathon 2021, organized by CDAC Mumbai and IEEE Bombay Section, with a team of 3 people.

- Led a team of 4 people to the finals of the Smart India Hackathon (SIH) 2020, organized by the Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD).

- Finalist in Gov-TechThon 2020, Hosted by IEEE Computer Society and supported by Oracle India and National Informatics Centre (NIC) India

- Successfully Qualified the Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering (GATE) in 2021, showcasing exceptional knowledge and expertise in the field.

metaData.name: Bettercode : Virtual Coding Platform.
metaData.details: + A web application that simplifies coding lab practicals for students and teachers with a seamless virtual experience, comprehensive tools, and user-friendly features. Built with ReactJS and Firebase backend, it enhances learning and ensures high-quality education in coding.
metaData.moreInfo: This application was developed as my final year project & I wrote a paper showcasing its unique features and benefits. I was first runner-up in the 2022 IEOM Society - 2nd India International Conference Paper Competition

metaData.name: PHP Satellite Backend App & Dashboard
metaData.details:
+ Created an open-source backend for PHP web hosting and SQL databases, featuring User Account Management APIs (sign-up, login, account management) and document database APIs (like MongoDB).

+ Provides a cost-effective solution for running a backend on inexpensive web hosting, enabling users to easily create dynamic websites without backend coding.

+ It includes a dashboard interface using ReactJS for simplified database and user management by website administrators.
metaData.moreInfo: During my college days, I developed websites for events. Dealing with backend development for each website was time-consuming, so I developed a generic backend that I could reuse for multiple websites.

chip.title: Github(Satellite Dashboard)
chip.assistantMsg: Opening PHP Satellite Dashboard code repository!

metaData.name: Bingo Minds : An Educational Game
metaData.details:
+ A Multiplayer Online Bingo Game that provides a fun and engaging way for players to learn and test their knowledge on various topics.

+ The game is built using ReactJS and Firebase Database, which allows multiple players to play the game together in real-time.
metaData.moreInfo: I developed this project and was awarded a cash prize for it in the EG-100 Educational Game Development Hackathon 2021, hosted by CDAC Mumbai and IEEE Bombay Section.

metaData.name: Chatbot Police Assistant for Reporting Crimes
metaData.details: + Developed a chatbot that registers complaints from people, similar to a police station. The chatbot collects information by asking questions about the incident, intelligently identifying the type of crime and adapting subsequent questions accordingly. The question flow is dynamic, with each question being determined based on the response to the previous question.
metaData.moreInfo: Developed this project during the 36-hour Smart India Hackathon (SIH) 2020.

metaData.name: BunkSquad: Attendance Management & Polling App
metaData.details:
+ Introducing BunkSquad, the ultimate Android application that delivers comprehensive attendance statistical reports, enables seamless real-time attendance management, and empowers users with a robust polling feature for effortless group decision-making across a wide range of topics.

+ The application is built using Android Studio (Java) for the frontend and utilizes Firebase as the backend.
